sub_title: Digital Marketing & Content expert | Creative & Sales strategy | Experienced Manager | E-commerce | Retail | Brand Management | Brand Partnerships
summary:
I am a dedicated and results-driven marketing professional with experience and a passion in representing and developing brands and campaigns from a-z, working with commercial objectives and building long lasting partnerships.
With a diverse background in both corporate giants and dynamic startups, I bring a unique blend of strategic thinking and hands-on creativity to the table. Currently residing in Amsterdam with my husband and our delightful baby daughter Ella.

school.name: The New School for Information Services

profile_positions.description:
As a key member of Maison365's management team, my role encompasses driving
customer acquisition, retention, and brand strategy, while exploring innovative avenues for growth, overseeing the marketing team's efforts in creative, performance, CRM, PR, and influencer marketing to fuel the company's overall top-line growth and strengthen the Maison365 brand.


• Strategic leadership: Key member of Maison365 management team
• Innovative growth: Explored and implemented creative strategies to expand the business, resulting in revenue growth.
• Comprehensive marketing: Oversaw multifaceted marketing efforts, including creative performance, CRM, PR and influencer marketing.
• Brand Enhancement: developed and executed brand strategies to elevate marketing presence and reinforce Maison365 identity.
• Strengthened Partnerships: Cultivated strategic relationships with influencers and stakeholders to amplify brand recognition.
profile_positions.title: Chief Commercial Officer

profile_positions.description:
In this role, I was responsible for establishing strategic marketing partnerships and
executing brand campaigns to enhance visibility, generate traffic, and drive sales for both De Bijenkorf and our partners. I collaborate closely with various stakeholders, evaluate campaign results, and negotiate with external partners to achieve our commercial objectives and maximize income from paid marketing partnerships.


• Strategic marketing partnerships: Forged impactful collaborations with key partners expanding reach and influence.
• Campaign Excellence: executing 360 brand campaigns for enhanced visibility, traffic generation and drive sales for the de Bijenkorf and key partners. 
• Stakeholder management: Ensured seamless collaboration and alignment with various stakeholders, fostering unified efforts towards our goals.
• Result analysis: conducted post-campaign evaluations, extracting insights that steered future strategies and optimizations.
profile_positions.title: Senior Brand Partnership Specialist

profile_positions.description:
In this role, I oversaw all promotion and commercial content on the De Bijenkorf website and app, managing the daily operations and ad-hoc activities of the team. I ensure the team's performance aligns with business objectives, delivering both ongoing operations and project-specific requirements. Additionally, I collaborate closely as a product owner with stakeholders from e-commerce, buying, and marketing departments to ensure seamless coordination and execution of content strategies.


• Promotion and Commercial Content Oversight: Spearheaded all promotional and commercial content activities on the de Bijenkorf website and App, managing day-to-day operations and overseeing content team tasks. 
• Strategic Performance Alignment: Aligned team performance with strategic business objectives, ensuring delivery of both ongoing operations and tailored project requirements.
• Product Ownership: Engaging closely with stakeholders across e-commerce, buying and marketing divisions. This involvement ensured the seamless coordination and execution of content strategies.
• Design Expertise and Proactive Client Engagement: Demonstrated design proficiency by creating mock-ups and wireframes to visualize concepts and elevate content presentation. Additionally, anticipated client needs proactively, delivering timely and impactful solutions.
profile_positions.title: Lead Commercial Content & Product Owner Digital Campaigns

profile_positions.description:
To enhance premium service, my focus lay on creating the ultimate personalized online shopping experience for de Bijenkorf shoppers. This includes establishing and managing a team of four online personal stylists within six months, as well as implementing a sales and target structure to drive results and meet customer satisfaction goals.


• Enhanced premium service: Crafted and executed strategies to elevate the premium service, resulting in an exceptional online shopping journey for de Bijenkorf customers.
•Team Leadership: Established and managed a team of four online personal stylists within 6 months.
•Sales strategy: Implemented a sales and target structure to drive results and achieve customer satisfaction goals.
profile_positions.title: Lead Digital Personal Styling (maternity leave cover)

profile_positions.description:
As a crucial link between the buying department of the HQ in Berlin and personal
shopper feedback, my role involves analyzing customer needs across different markets, attracting and developing top-notch personal shoppers, and setting monthly targets aligned with the business plan. Additionally, I oversee daily performance measurement, provide guidance to team leads, maintain a loyal and profitable customer base, communicate key country needs weekly, and collaborate with management on quarterly competitive positioning and strategy.


• Talent Acquisition and Development: Spearheaded the identification and nurturing of top-tier personal shoppers, ensuring a high-caliber team that aligns with the company standards of excellence.
• Strategic Target Setting: Collaborate with stakeholders to establish monthly performance targets that align with the overarching business plan and objectives.
• Guidance and Leadership: Offer expert guidance to team leads, fostering a cohesive and motivated workforce dedicated to achieving and surpassing collective goals.
• Client Relationship: Cultivate enduring relationships with customers, driving loyalty and profitability through service and tailored shopping experiences. 
• Effective Communication: Regularly communicate key country-specific requirements to optimize operational efficiency and ensure the fulfillment of unique market demands.
• Cross-Functional Liaison: Serve as a pivotal connection between the HQ buying department in Berlin and valuable personal shopper feedback channels.
profile_positions.title: Head of Styling

profile_positions.description:
With a global presence, Swiss International Hotels offers a diverse portfolio of upscale and luxury accommodations, combining elegant design, modern amenities, and attentive service to cater to the needs of both business and leisure travelers.

My expertise encompasses writing compelling press releases, organizing impactful PR�
related events, actively contributing to the development of guest loyalty programs, and driving business development initiatives.
profile_positions.title: Communications Manager

profile_positions.description:
Suitsupply USA is a renowned men's fashion brand offering stylish and impeccably tailored suits, shirts, and accessories.

During my internship at Suitsupply, I excelled in various PR-related tasks. This included
organizing events, managing product shipping to PR firms and celebrities, contributing to brainstorming sessions, writing press materials, and providing support in back-office operations. I made significant contributions to enhancing the brand's public relations efforts.
profile_positions.title: Marketing And Public Relations Intern

profile_positions.description:
Vogue Netherlands is a prestigious fashion magazine that showcases the latest trends, editorials, and features in the world of fashion, beauty, and lifestyle.

Assist and organize events following the launch of the first edition of Vogue and the
first edition of Vogue's Fashion Night Out.
